author: Kevin J. Anderson
review: An epic tale of ancient threats awakening and kingdoms on the brink of war. Kevin J. Anderson crafts a sweeping saga of dragons, magic, and political intrigue that will keep fantasy lovers hooked until the last page.

author: Patrick Rothfuss
review: The unforgettable story of Kvothe â€” a gifted child who grows into the most notorious wizard the world has ever known. A lyrical and immersive masterpiece of storytelling.

author: Brandon Sanderson
review: In a world ruled by a dark immortal emperor, a street thief discovers her incredible powers and joins a rebellion to bring him down. Intricate magic and breathtaking twists.

author: Brandon Sanderson
review: A massive high fantasy epic that weaves together the fates of warriors, scholars, and kings as storms rage and ancient secrets awaken. A cornerstone of modern fantasy.

bookName: The Priory of the Orange Tree
author: Samantha Shannon
review: A standalone fantasy that delivers dragons, queens, and ancient prophecies in a lush, sprawling tale of heroism and betrayal. A feminist take on high fantasy lore.

author: John Gwynne
review: Set in a Norse-inspired world where the gods are dead but their bones hold ancient power. Warriors and hunters clash in brutal battles and fierce quests.

author: V.E. Schwab
review: In a world with parallel Londons, only a few can travel between them. A thrilling tale of forbidden magic, dangerous secrets, and unforgettable characters.

author: Scott Lynch
review: A witty and gritty fantasy about a group of elite con artists pulling heists in a city ruled by crime and corruption. Clever, darkly funny, and masterfully plotted.

author: Brent Weeks
review: In a world where magic is harnessed through color, a powerful 'Prism' must stop a growing threat that could destroy an empire. An inventive and fast-paced fantasy.
